content: the courageous heart crochet coaster and holder pattern is designed to encourage that extra special friend who always presses forward with love and kindness no matter the circumstance the heart shaped pattern boasts a petite sized heart in the center of the coaster and several color changes to add visual interest the finished pattern produces a nicely sized coaster that fits most regular coffee or tea cups additionally this is a versatile pattern and can be made with the coasters independently or as a set with the coaster holder skill level intermediate materials *24/7 cotton® lionbrand yarns® 3 5 oz 186 yd terracota pink lemonade & ecru susan bates® 4 & 4 5 mm hooks yarn needle scissors measuring tape place stitch marker 2 gauge rounds 1-6 approximately 4-3/4 length 4-1/2 width stitch key adjustable loop bl back loop blsc back loop single_crochet chain or chs chain or chains cc1 contrasting color 1 pink lemonade cc2 contrasting color 2 ecru double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet mc main color terracota rs right side single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st or sts stitch or stitches treble_crochet treble_crochet ws wrong side yo yarn over
